title: Embroidery, 908–932 AD
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: plain cloth, embroidered
description: Tan linen plain cloth ground with embroidered Arabic inscription in red silk. Translation: "In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate. Praise be to God, Lord of the Worlds. Glory from God to the Caliph, Ja'far Allah (sic) al-Muqtador Billah."  Ruled 908-932 A.D.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery, 908–932 AD.Medium: linen, silk
Technique: plain cloth, embroidered. 1938-83-1.
